-92f84a8: Building a world where kids are seen
15557b48: Once Upon Our Time Capsule leverages the time-honored tradition of the time capsule to engage youth in documenting, sharing, and amplifying their stories. We help kids value their own voices and the voices of others, building a generation of confident, connected, and empathetic youth.
-2d4bdceb: There’s a lot going on in the world: the lingering impacts of pandemic, intense polarization, rise in everyday gun violence and the breakneck speed of social media and news.
-4f3208e2: Every year, we create a Youth Time Capsule documenting the voices, experiences and perspectives of kids. In a spin on the traditional time capsule, these stories are accessible for learning and discovery before being digitally preserved.
aacf4dc: We partner with schools, families and out-of-school organizations (e.g. libraries and summer camps) to document kids' stories using an experiential curriculum, aligned with core Social and Emotional Learning principles.
4665fdef: We share kids' stories on our digital online platform - "The Time Capsule" and then leverage in-person and online ways of exchanging stories and building relationships across communities.
-78880181: We amplify what we hear from kids through creative means to raise awareness of their experiences and perspectives.
342e0e17: At the same time, there are many wonderful things in the world that can be too easy to look past.
-256b6fca: A lot of it is hard to process. Kids are doing their best to navigate through it all. Yet,
338704d1: The good news is that when you give kids the opportunities and skills to pause and take stock of their own experiences, while listening and learning from the experience of others, we can
7e4d68e8: Serving Youth At a Critical Stage
4c21b21f: when kids are becoming more independent, begin to see the point of others more clearly, and encounter a range of significant - and often challenging - emotional and social changes.

65fae76b: We ask that only adults over the age of 18 contact us through our website and that any personal information provided about a child is only provided by a parent or guardian of that child. That said, understanding that sometimes kids can fill out a form on a website, we’ve established this Privacy Policy. Our collection of personal information is intended to follow the principles of the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (“COPPA”), a U.S. law designed to protect the online privacy of children under the age of 13.
-5f8795a: “Once Upon Our Time Capsule is” also is referred to as “we,” “us” or “our” in this Privacy Policy.
-2c104a3: The only information we collect is represented in our online forms: first name, school, grade and email from an authorized guardian. We don’t collect cookies, IP addresses, or other hidden anonymous identifiers.
-2d4390d3: We use the personal information we collect for notifying the parents or guardians of authors whose Time Capsules have been submitted about Time Capsule related programming.
67bda498: Otherwise, we do not make personal information collected from children publicly available nor do we enable children to so on our platforms. We will not condition a child’s participation in any activity or service on the disclosure of more personal information than is reasonably necessary to participate in an activity.
